description: Lists data sources in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which to list the data sources.

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the project in which to list data sources.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListDataSources action.

nested_items.name: connectionId
nested_items.description: The connection ID that's part of the data source summary.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the data source was created.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the data source.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The data source description.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the data source exists.

nested_items.name: enableSetting
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the data source is enabled.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment in which the data source exists.

nested_items.name: lastRunAssetCount
nested_items.description: The count of the assets created during the last data source run.

nested_items.name: lastRunAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the data source run was last performed.

nested_items.name: lastRunErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The details of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: errorDetail
nested_items.description: The details of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: errorType
nested_items.description: The type of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: lastRunStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the last data source run.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the data source.

nested_items.name: schedule
nested_items.description: The schedule of the data source runs.

nested_items.name: timezone
nested_items.description: The timezone of the data source run.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data source.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the data source.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the data source was updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of data sources is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of data sources, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListDataSources to list the next set of data sources.
